title: Honoring Dr. Alfred T. Frontera upon the occasion of receiving the Making A Difference Award from Always There
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION honoring Dr. Alfred T. Frontera upon the occasion
of  receiving the Making A Difference Award from Always There on Septem-
ber 24, 2010

WHEREAS, It is the practice of this Legislative Body to take note of and
publicly acknowledge those exemplary individuals whose purposeful  lives
and  distinguished  careers have been committed to bettering the quality
of life in this great Empire State; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Dr.
Alfred T. Frontera upon the occasion of receiving the Making  A  Differ-
ence Award from Always There at its Third Annual "An Evening in Tuscany"
Gala  to  be  held  on Friday, September 24, 2010, at the Lazy Swan Golf
Course; and
  WHEREAS, Always There is a not-for-profit organization  that  provides
skilled  in-home  health services, compassionate personal care and adult
day programs within the Mid-Hudson Valley; and
  WHEREAS, Always There's Making A Difference Award was created for  the
express  purpose  of  acknowledging local unsung heroes who have donated
their energies and resources, often for many years, without  thought  of
award or recognition; and
  WHEREAS,  This  annual award acknowledges those individuals and organ-
izations who have demonstrated excellence, volunteerism, or  exceptional
dedication to the missions and programs of Always There; and
  WHEREAS,  Dr.  Alfred  Frontera  has  continually demonstrated extreme
competence, extraordinary intelligence, and diligent leadership  in  his
unwavering  service  to  senior citizens living in the Mid-Hudson Valley
and consequently has been selected for this most  prestigious  commenda-
tion; and
  WHEREAS,  Dr.  Alfred Frontera has practiced neurology for the past 40
years; throughout his esteemed career, he has helped countless  patients
and  their families, truly making a difference throughout the Mid-Hudson
Valley community; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual for the benefit of others which Dr. Alfred  Frontera  has  displayed
throughout his life; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense  of  this Legislative Body that those who
enhance the quality of life in their community and have shown a long and
sustained commitment to the  maintenance  of  high  standards  in  their
profession,  certainly have earned recognition and applause; now, there-
fore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Dr.  Alfred  Frontera upon the occasion of receiving the Making A
Difference Award from Always There; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Dr. Alfred Frontera.
